summary: This document is a letter from Jeffrey Epstein authorizing Hany Beller and Jeanne Brennan to have signing authority on a Deutsche Bank account. It serves as a formal communication regarding financial management.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the account holder who is granting signing authority to two individuals in this document.

persons.name: Hany Beller
persons.context: Hany Beller is mentioned as an individual who is granted signing authority on Epstein's account.

persons.name: Jeanne Brennan
persons.context: Jeanne Brennan is also granted signing authority on Epstein's account as per the letter.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein is granting Hany Beller signing authority on his bank account, indicating a professional relationship.
Jeffrey Epstein is granting Jeanne Brennan signing authority on his bank account, indicating a professional relationship.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein authorizes Hany Beller and Jeanne Brennan to have signing authority on a Deutsche Bank account.
The letter is marked as confidential.
